title: Red Wind In Need of Discreet Couriers
titleHUD: Red Wind In Need of Discreet Couriers
description:
RED WIND LINEHAUL
'YOUR GOODS IN GOOD HANDS'
----------------------------

I know you've done some solid work for us in the past, so I figured I'd see if you were interested in handling a bit of a special run for us that's a bit farther out in the system than what you've been doing so far.

In a nutshell, we need a pilot who's willing to keep their head down, focus on getting the packages delivered, and most importantly, not ask a lot of questions.

See, for a smaller company like us, staying ahead of competition means that we need to offer our clients something they can't get elsewhere - discretion. At Red Wind, as long as you got the credits we'll take whatever to wherever. Understand?

If that sounds good to you, let's see how you do on this run -

PACKAGES FOR PICK UP (ANY ORDER)
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) from ~mission(Pickup1|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) from ~mission(Pickup2|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) from ~mission(Pickup3|Address)

DROP OFF LOCATIONS (ANY ORDER)
     · Package #~mission(item1|serialnumber) to ~mission(Dropoff1|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item2|serialnumber) to ~mission(Dropoff2|Address)
     · Package #~mission(item3|serialnumber) to ~mission(Dropoff3|Address)

One last bit of advice, it would probably be good to avoid any unnecessary delays once you got the packages onboard, for example being searched by local law enforcement.
